edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints

Class StudentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints.StudentManager

  • public class StudentManager
extends Object
    Class that manages all interactions with the students database in the PocketPoints app. This class abstracts the front-end of the application from the implementation of the back end, so that if the database's implementation was changed, only this class would have to be altered.

    All of the activities and fragments in the PocketPoints app should access the database through this class. They should not (repeat: *NOT*) access the database implementation directly.

    Author:
    ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static StudentManager get(Context context)
        Gets the singleton instance of StudentManager. If no instance currently exists, create an instance using the singleton application context provided by the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of StudentManager

      • getTestInstance

        public static StudentManager getTestInstance(Context context)
        Creates an instance of StudentManager for the given test context.

        PLEASE NOTE that this method exists only for testing the StudentManager. Please use it for NO other purpose.

        Parameters:
        context - the context of the test for which to create this StudentManager instance
        Returns:
        the StudentManager test instance for the given context

      • createStudent

        public boolean createStudent(Student student)
        Adds the given student to the database. If the student was successfully added, changes the ID of the student to reflect the student's unique ID in the database. If the student was not added, sets the ID of the student to an invalid value.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to add
        Returns:
        true if the student was successfully created in the database; otherwise false

      • getAllStudents

        public List<Student> getAllStudents()
        Retrieves all of the students from the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all students in the database

      • getStudent

        public Student getStudent(long id)
        Retrieves the student with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the student to get
        Returns:
        the student with the given ID, or null if there is no student with the given ID in the database

      • updateStudent

        public boolean updateStudent(Student student)
        Updates the values associated with the given student in the database.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to update
        Returns:
        true if the student was successfully updated in the database; otherwise false

      • deleteStudent

        public boolean deleteStudent(long id)
        Deletes the student with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the student to delete
        Returns:
        true if the student was successfully deleted from the database; otherwise false
